short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper to debug Amazon Ad tag setup on your website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazon Ad Tag (AAT) is a tiny piece of code that helps advertisers understand how people interact with their website. Error-free implementation and functioning of AAT set-up is mandatory for advertisers to track conversions and/or create re-marketing audiences. For web-based, off-Amazon signals can then be activated for optimization and re-marketing goals.  Amazon Ad Tag Helper is a Chrome extension that helps advertisers verify event and attribute fires and provides real-time feedback on tag implementation.
